p: In addition to the above-mentioned folding proteins, two other proteins presented structural alterations. HIF1α exhibited structural changes at the helix-loop-helix (bHLH), Per-ARNT-Sim (PAS) and DNA-binding domains. The HIF1α transcription factor presented two non-synonymous substitutions between species ( S5 Table, supporting information), one of which overlaps with predicted structural changes in coil regions in the PAS domain ( Fig 1 and S5 Table, supporting information).
